post.body: Surreally serial, I'm guessing.
(cont) limit to Everyday | All day
Easy to fix. In AP settings, select Access | MAC Address Access Control | Time Access. Add your MAC address, and set time (cont)
I look forward to to your detailed post on the topic.
deal
Understood. But is disclosure insufficient only when we say it is? Seems like a circular argument.
What if the co. is *already* doing that? How much of his health is material? At what point is disclosure complete? Not easy.
We're in agreement on 'material' aspect. How does media balance conflicting goals of privacy vs. disclosure? Is it possible?
I have mixed feelings: yes, it is material to Apple. But Steve & his family should have some privacy. How do you balance the two?
"A doctor named Goldman... he squeezes your sac." That dude was right.
I'm giving you the finger right now. And now again... and one more time. I feel *waay* better. This giving stuff really works.
It was a business expense that I had to take before year-end.
he may have needed to make the purchase b4 year-end, like me.
All good things...
... and made connections w/ so many others whom I expect to meet in person in 2009, especially the TO crew.
Met a lotta great people this year cuz of twitter: @pkedrosky @rklau @markdowds @mase @mandelbrot @tobiaspeggs @salsop @micah @andrewhyde ..
hey there
Bought another 20" iMac just now; used apple's online store & was painless as usual.
ordering more apple gear before year-end
If the latest rumor about Steve Jobs is true, I feel bad for him & his family. This shouldn't play out like a Britney story.
